mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM (SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, D.pd_category_name FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2) A

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, D.pd_category_name, ifnull(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM (SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, email FROM payment A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.payment_user_id = B.usr_id LEFT JOIN user_grant D ON B.usr_id = D.user_grant_no left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
${item} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2) A

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, email, username, D.user_grant_name, IFNULL(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.payment_user_id = B.usr_id LEFT JOIN user_grant D ON B.usr_id = D.user_grant_no left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
${item} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM (SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, S.store_name FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN store S ON S.store_id = C.product_store_id left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2) A

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, S.store_name, IFNULL(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN store S ON S.store_id = C.product_store_id left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, B.code_name, IFNULL(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A LEFT JOIN code B ON B.code = 'product_payment_type' AND A.payment_type_cd = B.code_value left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
${item} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM (SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, B.code_name FROM payment A LEFT JOIN code B ON B.code = 'product_payment_type' AND A.payment_type_cd = B.code_value left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
${item} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2) A

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM (SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_tex_class,'|',1) product_tax_class FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2) A

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_tex_class,'|',1) = 'A' THEN '과세' WHEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_tex_class,'|',1) = 'B' THEN '면세' ELSE '영세' END AS product_tax_class, ifnull(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM ( WITH t3 AS (select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date, '10대' as age from payment group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') union all select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date, '20대' as age from payment group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') union all select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date, '30대' as age from payment group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') union all select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date, '40대' as age from payment group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') union all select DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date, '50대이상' as age from payment group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') ), t2 AS ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') as reg_date, case when date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(B.BIRTH, 1, 4) < 19 then '10대' when date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(B.BIRTH, 1, 4)< 29 then '20대' when date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(B.BIRTH, 1, 4)< 39 then '30대' when date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(B.BIRTH, 1, 4)< 49 then '40대' else '50대이상' end as age , C.product_cd , A.payment_cd , COUNT(A.payment_cd) as payment_order_quantity , IFNULL(COUNT(C.product_cd),0) as product_count , (C.product_user_payment * A.payment_order_quantity) as product_user_payment , ((C.product_user_payment - C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity) as product_discount , ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) as cancel_request_amount FROM payment A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.payment_user_id = B.usr_id left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' group by A.reg_date , C.product_cd , A.payment_cd ), t4 as ( select a.reg_date , a.age , ifnull(b.payment_order_quantity, 0) as payment_order_quantity , product_cd as product_count , ifnull(product_user_payment, 0) as product_user_payment , ifnull(product_discount, 0) as product_discount , ifnull(cancel_request_amount, 0) as cancel_request_amount from t3 as a left join t2 as b on a.reg_date = b.reg_date and a.age = b.age ) select reg_date , age , sum(payment_order_quantity) as payment_order_quantity , IFNULL(count(product_count),0) as product_count , sum(product_user_payment) as product_user_payment , sum(product_discount) as product_discount , sum(cancel_request_amount) as cancel_request_amount from t4 group by reg_date DESC, age ASC ) c
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date}

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, age, sum(payment_order_quantity) as payment_order_quantity, sum(product_count) as product_count, sum(product_user_payment) as product_user_payment, sum(product_discount) as product_discount, sum(cancel_request_amount) as cancel_request_amount from( WITH t3 AS ( select reg_date, '10대' as age from payment group by reg_date union all select reg_date, '20대' as age from payment group by reg_date union all select reg_date, '30대' as age from payment group by reg_date union all select reg_date, '40대' as age from payment group by reg_date union all select reg_date, '50대이상' as age from payment group by reg_date ), t2 AS ( SELECT A.reg_date, case when date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(B.BIRTH, 1, 4) < 19 then '10대' when date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(B.BIRTH, 1, 4)< 29 then '20대' when date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(B.BIRTH, 1, 4)< 39 then '30대' when date_format(now(), '%Y')-substring(B.BIRTH, 1, 4)< 49 then '40대' else '50대이상' end as age , C.product_cd , A.payment_cd , COUNT(A.payment_cd) as payment_order_quantity , IFNULL(COUNT(C.product_cd),0) as product_count , (C.product_user_payment * A.payment_order_quantity) as product_user_payment , ((C.product_user_payment - C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity) as product_discount , ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) as cancel_request_amount FROM payment A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.payment_user_id = B.usr_id left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' group by A.reg_date , C.product_cd , A.payment_cd ), t4 as ( select a.reg_date , a.age , ifnull(b.payment_order_quantity, 0) as payment_order_quantity , product_cd as product_count , ifnull(product_user_payment, 0) as product_user_payment , ifnull(product_discount, 0) as product_discount , ifnull(cancel_request_amount, 0) as cancel_request_amount from t3 as a left join t2 as b on a.reg_date = b.reg_date and a.age = b.age ) select reg_date , age , sum(payment_order_quantity) as payment_order_quantity , IFNULL(count(product_count),0) as product_count , sum(product_user_payment) as product_user_payment , sum(product_discount) as product_discount , sum(cancel_request_amount) as cancel_request_amount from t4 group by reg_date DESC, age ASC ) c group by DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') DESC, age
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM (SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, CASE WHEN U.sex = '02' THEN '여자' WHEN U.sex = '01' THEN '남자' ELSE '' END AS gender FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN user U ON U.usr_id = A.payment_user_id left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2) A

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d')
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'))
DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m')
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),concat(QUARTER(A.reg_date),'분기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y '),if(QUARTER(A.reg_date) IN (1,2),'상반기','하반기'))
concat(DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y'),'년') reg_date, CASE WHEN U.sex = '02' THEN '여자' WHEN U.sex = '01' THEN '남자' ELSE '' END AS gender, ifnull(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN user U ON U.usr_id = A.payment_user_id left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1,2 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') reg_date, IFNULL(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m.%d') reg_date FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1) A

SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')) reg_date, IFNULL(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM(SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d'), '~', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(A.reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(A.reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')) reg_date FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1) A

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m') reg_date, IFNULL(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status IN ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1 order by A.reg_date desc LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_date,'%Y.%m') reg_date FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N' AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1) A

select * from (select *,@num:=@num+1 rank from (SELECT D.pd_category_name, ifnull(COUNT(A.payment_cd),0) payment_order_quantity, ifnull(COUNT(distinct C.product_id),0) product_count, ifnull(sum(C.product_user_payment*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_user_payment, ifnull(SUM((C.product_user_payment-C.product_payment)*A.payment_order_quantity),0) product_discount, ifnull(sum(IF(A.payment_status in ('C','G'),A.payment,0)),0) cancel_request_amount FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY sum(payment_order_quantity) desc) ori, (select @num:=0 from dual) sub) wrap LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, ${displayRowCount}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM (SELECT D.pd_category_name FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
AND pd_category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{category1},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category2},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) OR FIND_IN_SET(#{category3},replace(product_ct,'|',',')) )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1) A

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) cnt FROM (SELECT C.product_cd FROM payment A left JOIN product C ON A.product_CD = C.product_CD left JOIN product_category D ON D.pd_category_id = SUBSTRING_INDEX(C.product_ct,'|',1) where 1=1 and A.order_no NOT LIKE 'GW%' and A.payment_status != 'N'
${item} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' )
AND A.reg_date >= #{start_date} AND A.reg_date < #{end_date} GROUP BY 1) A
